name: Arenafight
body:
### Welcome to Arena Fight

Arena Fight is a Battle-Arena Fighting Game in the vein of Super Smash Bros. The project came about while playing the Super Smash Bros 4 demo. As I played the demo, the desire to make a fighting arena based game overtook me. I desired to create a similar game and add my own personal spin to it.

This project was previously named Jump Arena. Development recently began and is not yet in a playable state.

### Updates:
```
September 25, 2014
- Completed Player and Fighter framework
- Animation framework added and player animations added
- Added Collision with stage
- Added in basic gameplay (movement)

September 24, 2014
- Completed framework for Stages and added a new Stage, Training
- About 50% done with Player framework done, but abnormal bug has halted
progress until I can fix it. Game literally unplayable.
- Added "data tables" to store stage data and character data
respectively.

September 23, 2014
- Implemented a state stack to handle what the current state of the game
is and included 4 states, Title, Main, Game, Pause
- Implemented template Resource Holder to easily organize and access
assets
- Implemented Utility class for basic functions that may be needed
throughout the program
- Added basic menus and menu navigation for title screen, main menu, and
pause menu.
- Implemented frameworks for Players, Fighters, Stages, and Battles
- Battles hold all objects that are involved in the battle (Players and
the Stage). Players hold an object of the Fighter they are controlling.
- Changed World class to Battle class
```
[Back to Main Page](http://mvpet.github.io/)
